rules.text: If there is flora along the way, the bearsloth goes in search of food. »» Move this being along the way.
If this predator is along the way, you feel a large presence looming over you. »» Suffer 1 fatigue.
If you have 4 or more fatigue, exhaust this being. »» Suffer 1 injury and move this being within reach.
AWA + [connection]: Keep one eye on the raccoon and the other on the path to exhaust this being and add [symbol] to it equal to your effort. If you fail, draw a path card.
Clear [progress]: Search your Ranger discard for a gear and add it to your hand.
Discard an equipped gear. »» Add 1 loot to this being. If there are 2 or more loot on this being, shuffle it into the path deck.
If there is an active predator, exhaust it. »» Add [harm] to this being equal to that predator's presence.
Response: After adding 1 or more [harm] to this feature, add 1 bee to each Cloudhive Swarm in play.
If there are no Cloudhive Swarms in play. »» Search the path discard and deck for the next Cloudhive Swarm.
If there is an active mammal, exhaust it. »» Add [progress] to it and [harm] to this feature, both equal to the mammal's presence.
Refresh: Add 1 bee to this swarm.
You can add a maximum of 1[harm] per test to this swarm.
X is equal to the number of bees on this swarm.
If X is greater than or equal to your FIT aspect, exhaust this swarm. »» Suffer 1 injury.
If this being is attached to a role or a being with persistent, it gains Persistent.
FOC + [conflict]: Peel [2] away the soporific tendrils to add [harm] to this being equal to your effort. If you fail, attach it to your role.
If this biomeld is attached to a being, add 1[harm] to that being. If it is not attached, attach it to a being of your choice.
If this being is attached to your role, suffer 1 injury. If it is not attached, attach it to your role.
FIT + [reason]: Climb up to reach the sweetest of the insect-luring fruit to add 1[harm] to this feature, discard 1 token from an insect in play, and soothe 1 fatigue.
If there is an insect in play, exhaust this feature. »» Ready an insect.
If there is an active mammal, exhaust it. »» Add [progress] to it and [harm] to this feature, both equal to that mammal's presence.
Obstacle.
Clear [harm]: Discard each flora in play. Each Ranger suffers fatigue equal to 2 plus the combined presence of all flora discarded this way.
Add 1[harm] to this feature. If the weather is inclement, increase the number of [harm] added by 1.
While your [Ranger Token] is on this feature, treat each card within reach as exhausted, but you cannot add [progress] to features or the location.
FIT + [reason]: Climb [2] the towering trees to get your bearings to either move your [Ranger Token] to this feature or remove it from this feature. If you fail, suffer 1 injury.
A Ranger may remove their [Ranger Token] from this feature.
